subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two games in Europe against the Miami Heat will highlight the Nets’ preseason schedule. The teams will play in Paris on Oct. 9 and in London on Oct. 12. The games mark the first time the Nets have played outside the United States since they played a preseason game against Golden State in Mexico City before the 1999-2000 season. After they return, the Nets will play five more preseason games. The Nets begin the regular season Oct. 29 at Washington.
